item.title: Domain Shopping Sprees
item.description: It’s a guilty pleasure of mine, but I LOVE buying domains. I don’t remember when or how it all started, but it’s more addictive than PokÃ©mon - I GOTTA CLAIM ‘EM ALL! ðŸ˜‚ A while back, an article hit the front page of HackerNews describing how terrible domain parking is. I’m guilty of this, but I don’t regret it. From side projects to creative domains, grabbing a good URL and throw something up there is fun!
